Prompts the user for authorization using HTTP Basic Auth

#### Parameters

- user / string (patch)
    
- passwd / string (patch)
    

#### Response

| **Code** | **Description** |
| --- | --- |
| 200 | Sucessful authentication. |
| 401 | Unsuccessful authentication. |

Prompts the user for authorization using bearer authentication.

#### Parameters

- Authorization (header)
    

#### Responses

| **Code** | **Description** |
| --- | --- |
| 200 | Sucessful authentication. |
| 401 | Unsuccessful authentication. |

Prompts the user for authorization using Digest Auth.

#### Parameters

- qop / string (path) - auth or auth-int
    
- user / string (path)
    
- passwd / (path)
    

#### Responses

| **Code** | **Description** |
| --- | --- |
| 200 | Sucessful authentication. |
| 401 | Unsuccessful authentication. |

Prompts the user for authorization using Digest Auth + Algorithm.

#### Parameters

- qop / string (path) - auth or auth-int
    
- user / string (path)
    
- passwd / string (path)
    
- algorithm / string (path) - MD5, SHA-256, SHA-512, _Default value_ _: MD5_
    

#### Responses

| **Code** | **Description** |
| --- | --- |
| 200 | Sucessful authentication. |
| 401 | Unsuccessful authentication. |

Prompts the user for authorization using Digest Auth + Algorithm.

allow settings the stale_after argument.

#### Parameters

- qop / string (path) - auth or auth-int
    
- user / string (path)
    
- passwd / string (path)
    
- algorithm / string (path) - MD5, SHA-256, SHA-512, _Default value_ _: MD5_
    
- stale_after / string (path) - _Default value_ _: never_
    

#### Responses

| **Code** | **Description** |
| --- | --- |
| 200 | Sucessful authentication. |
| 401 | Unsuccessful authentication. |

Prompts the user for authorization using HTTP Basic Auth.

#### Parameters

- user / string (path)
    
- passwd / string (path)
    

#### Responses

| **Code** | **Description** |
| --- | --- |
| 200 | Sucessful authentication. |
| 404 | Unsuccessful authentication. |

item.name: Response inspection

request.description:
Returns a 304 if an If-Modified-Since header or If-None-Match is present. Returns the same as a GET otherwise.

#### Parameters

- If-Modified-Since (header)
    
- If-None-Match (header)
    

#### Responses

| **Code** | **Description** |
| --- | --- |
| 200 | Cached response |
| 304 | Modified |

Sets a Cache-Control header for n seconds.  

#### Parameters

- value / integer (path)
    

#### Responses  

| **Code** | **Description** |
| --- | --- |
| 200 | Cache control set |

Assumes the resource has the given etag and responds to If-None-Match and If-Match headers appropriately.

#### Parameters

- If-None-Match (header)
    
- If-Match (header)
    

#### Responses

| **Code** | **Description** |
| --- | --- |
| 200 | Normal response |
| 412 | Match |

| 200 | A delayed response |

Drips data over a duration after an optional initial delay.

#### Parameters

- duration / number (query) - The amount of time (in seconds) over which to drip each byte, _Default value_ : 2
    
- numbytes/ integer (query) - The number of bytes to respond with, _Default value_ : 10
    
- code / integer (query) - The response code that will be returned, _Default value_ : 200
    
- delay/ number (query) - The amount of time (in seconds) to delay before responding, _Default value_ : 2
    

#### Responses

| **Code** | **Description** |
| --- | --- |
| 200 | A dripped response |
